snippet: The choreographer staged five short works (including “Division,” a New York premiere) with his troupe.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews program of dance pieces, include New York premiere of Brian Brooks work Division, performed by Brian Brooks Moving Company at Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer staged five short works (including “Division,” a New York premiere) with his troupe.

headline.main: Review: Brian Brooks Moving Company Keeps Things Off-Center at the Joyce Theater
